<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:пробуждение.html>пробужде́ние</a> (10251)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%83%D0%B6%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:пробуждение.html>пробужде́ние</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">probuždénije</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:пробуждение.html>пробужде́ния</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:пробуждение.html>пробужде́ния</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:пробуждение.html>пробужде́ний</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>awakening, waking</li>
<li>arousal <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">the act of arousing or the state of being aroused</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%83%D0%B6%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:пробуждать.html>пробужда́ть</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">probuždátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%83%D0%B4%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="прробудить (page does not exist)">прробудить</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">prrobudítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:пробуждаться.html>пробужда́ться</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">probuždátʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%83%D0%B4%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="прробудиться (page does not exist)">прробудиться</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">prrobudítʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%83%D0%B6%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:про.html>про</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>буж<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:де.html>де</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ни.html>ни</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>е</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 7a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:встречаться.html>Встреча́ется</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:также.html>та́кже</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вариант.html>вариа́нт</a> словообразования: пробужденье.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>про-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-бужд-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ениj</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-е</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%83%D0%B6%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:действие.html>де́йствие</a> | <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>значе́нию</a> гл. <a href = vnd.unilang:пробуждать.html>пробужда́ть</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:пробудить.html>пробуди́ть</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:пробуждаться.html>пробужда́ться</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:пробудиться.html>пробуди́ться</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:прекращение.html>прекраще́ние</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сон.html>сна</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

<ol><li>просыпание (разг.)</li>

</body>***пробурчать.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:пробурчать.html>пробурча́ть</a> (10059)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%83%D1%80%D1%87%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">про-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">pro-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бурчать.html>бурча́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">burčátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%83%D1%80%D1%87%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:пробурчать.html>пробурча́ть</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">proburčátʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бурчать.html>бурча́ть</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to grumble, to rumble <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content">to make a low growling or rumbling stomach noise</span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li>
<li>to grumble, to complain</li>
<li>to mutter, to mumble</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%83%D1%80%D1%87%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">буркать</span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">búrkatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:буркнуть.html>бу́ркнуть</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">búrknutʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%83%D1%80%D1%87%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:про.html>про</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:бурый.html>бур</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>чать</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершить.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 5b.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующего</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́ла</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:нет.html>нет</a>.

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:пробыть.html>пробы́ть</a> (8080)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%8B%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">про-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">pro-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>быть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">bytʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%8B%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:пробыть.html>пробы́ть</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">probýtʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">пробывать</b>) <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">imperfective is dated</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span>
</p>
<ol><li>to stay (somewhere)</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%8B%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:про.html>про</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>быть</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершить.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,   <a href = vnd.unilang:изолированный.html>изоли́рованное</a> спряжение, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | ^a/c[①].      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | пробывать.

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:провайдер.html>прова́йдер</a> (22491)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B9%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%80amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>Borrowed from <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.Org/wiki/English_language" class="extiw" title="w:English language">English</a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="en">provider</i>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B9%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%80amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провайдер.html>прова́йдер</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">provájdɛr</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провайдер.html>прова́йдера</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провайдер.html>прова́йдеры</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провайдер.html>прова́йдеров</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">computing</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> Internet provider</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%B9%D0%B4%D0%B5%D1%80amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:про.html>про</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>вай<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:дер.html>дер</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).

</body>***провал.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:провал.html>прова́л</a> (4212)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BBamp;action=editamp;section=3" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провал.html>прова́л</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">provál</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провал.html>прова́ла</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провал.html>прова́лы</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провал.html>прова́лов</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>collapse</li>
<li>hole, depression</li>
<li>failure, flop</li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BBamp;action=editamp;section=5" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:проваливать.html>прова́ливать</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">proválivatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провалить.html>провали́ть</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">provalítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:проваливаться.html>прова́ливаться</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">proválivatʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провалиться.html>провали́ться</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">provalítʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BBamp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:про.html>про</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:вал.html>вал</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>про-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-вал-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BBamp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

</body>***проваливать.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:проваливать.html>прова́ливать</a> (20122)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провалить.html>провали́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">provalítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ивать</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ivatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:проваливать.html>прова́ливать</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">proválivatʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провалить.html>провали́ть</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to botch up, to ruin, to mess up</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to fail</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial<span class="ib-comma">,</span> | imperfective only<span class="ib-comma">,</span> | in the imperative</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to get lost
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:проваливать.html>прова́ливай</a></b>!</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>proválivaj</b>!</i> ― <span class="e-translation">off/away with you!; make yourself scarce!; buzz off!</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провал.html>прова́л</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">provál</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:валиться.html>вали́ться</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">valítʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:повалиться.html>повали́ться</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">povalítʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:свалиться.html>свали́ться</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">svalítʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">валкий</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">válkij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">валка</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">válka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=3" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:про.html>про</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ва<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ли.html>ли</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>вать</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершенный.html>соверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:провалить.html>провали́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>про-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-вал-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ива</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=17" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:про.html>про</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ва<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ли.html>ли</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>вать</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершенный.html>соверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:провалить.html>провали́ть</a>.

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:проваливаться.html>прова́ливаться</a> (7933)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:проваливать.html>прова́ливать</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">proválivatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ся</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-sja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:проваливаться.html>прова́ливаться</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">proválivatʹsja</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провалиться.html>провали́ться</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to fall through, to come down</li>
<li>to fail, to flunk (on an exam)</li>
<li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">passive of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:проваливать.html>прова́ливать</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">proválivatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провал.html>прова́л</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">provál</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:про.html>про</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ва<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ли.html>ли</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>вать<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ся</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,  <a href = vnd.unilang:возвратный.html>возвра́тный</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершенный.html>соверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:провалиться.html>провали́ться</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>про-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-вал-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ива</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b>; постфикс: <b>-ся</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:падать.html>па́дать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> какое-либо <a href = vnd.unilang:отверстие.html>отве́рстие</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:оступиться.html>оступи́вшись</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вместе.html>вме́сте</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> обрушившейся <a href = vnd.unilang:опора.html>опо́рой</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:погружаться.html>погружа́ться</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:во.html>во</a> что-либо <a href = vnd.unilang:жидкий.html>жи́дкое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:вязкий.html>вя́зкое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:рыхлый.html>ры́хлое</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:вязнуть.html>вя́знуть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> чём-либо <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:разрушаться.html>разруша́ясь</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:валиться.html>вали́ться</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:падать.html>па́дать</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:обрушиваться.html>обру́шиваться</a>, проламываться <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

</body>***провалить.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:провалить.html>провали́ть</a> (17116)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">про-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">pro-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:валить.html>вали́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">valítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провалить.html>провали́ть</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">provalítʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:проваливать.html>прова́ливать</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to botch up, to ruin, to mess up
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:провалить.html>провали́ть</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:дело.html>дело</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>provalítʹ</b> délo</i> ― <span class="e-translation">to ruin things; make a mess of things; mess things up; gum up the works</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:провалить.html>провали́ть</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:роль.html>роль</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>provalítʹ</b> rolʹ</i> ― <span class="e-translation">to ruin ones part</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:провалить.html>провали́ть</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:экзамен.html>экза́мен</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>provalítʹ</b> ekzámen</i> ― <span class="e-translation">to fail/flunk an exam</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to fail
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:провалить.html>провали́ть</a></b> кого-либо <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:письменный.html>пи́сьменном</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:экзамен.html>экза́мене</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>provalítʹ</b> kovó-libo na písʹmennom ekzámene</i> ― <span class="e-translation">fail smb in the written paper</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:оппозиция.html>оппози́ция</a> <b>провалила</b> <a href = vnd.unilang:план.html>план</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:правительство.html>прави́тельства</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">oppozícija <b>provalíla</b> plan pravítelʹstva</i> ― <span class="e-translation">the opposition torpedoed the government's plan</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:провалить.html>провали́ть</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:законопроект.html>законопрое́кт</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>provalítʹ</b> zakonoproékt</i> ― <span class="e-translation">to kill the bill</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:провалить.html>провали́ть</a></b> кого-либо <a href = vnd.unilang:при.html>при</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:голосование.html>голосова́нии</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>provalítʹ</b> kovó-libo pri golosovánii</i> ― <span class="e-translation">to vote smb down</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провал.html>прова́л</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">provál</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:валиться.html>вали́ться</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">valítʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:повалиться.html>повали́ться</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">povalítʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:свалиться.html>свали́ться</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">svalítʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">валкий</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">válkij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">валка</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">válka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:провалить.html>провали́ть</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершить.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>про-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-вал-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:соорудить.html>-и</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

</body>***провалиться.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:провалиться.html>провали́ться</a> (3568)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провалить.html>провали́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">provalítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ся</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-sja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провалиться.html>провали́ться</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">provalítʹsja</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:проваливаться.html>прова́ливаться</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to fall through, to come down
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:потолок.html>потоло́к</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:провалиться.html>провали́лся</a></b></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">potolók <b>provalílsja</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation">the ceiling has come down</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>как</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сквозь.html>сквозь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:земля.html>зе́млю</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:провалиться.html>провали́лся</a></b></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">kak skvozʹ zémlju <b>provalílsja</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation">vanished into thin air</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:провалиться.html>провали́ться</a></b> мне <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:этот.html>э́том</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:место.html>ме́сте</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:если.html>е́сли</a> ...</i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>provalítʹsja</b> mne na étom méste, jésli ...</i> ― <span class="e-translation">I'll be damned if ...</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li>to fail, to flunk (on an exam)
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:провалиться.html>провали́ться</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:треск.html>тре́ском</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>provalítʹsja</b> s tréskom</i> ― <span class="e-translation">to turn out a complete fiasco</span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention">passive of <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провалить.html>провали́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">provalítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провал.html>прова́л</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">provál</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:про.html>про</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ва<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ли.html>ли</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ться</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершить.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,  <a href = vnd.unilang:возвратный.html>возвра́тный</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 4c.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>про-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-вал-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:соорудить.html>-и</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b>; постфикс: <b>-ся</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

</body>***проведать.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:проведать.html>прове́дать</a> (13442)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">про-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">pro-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ведать.html>ведать</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">védatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:проведать.html>прове́дать</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">provédatʹ</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">проведывать</b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to come to see, to call <i>(on)</i></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content">colloquial</span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> to find out, to learn <i>(of, about)</i></li></ol>

<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:узнать.html>узна́ть</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">uznátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=7" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ведать.html>ведать</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">védatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ведомо.html>ве́домо</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">védomo</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:невесть.html>неве́сть</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nevéstʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:проведать.html>прове́дать</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершить.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 1a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | проведывать.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>про-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-вед-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%82%D1%8Camp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:проведение.html>проведе́ние</a> (3445)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p>From <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:проводить.html>проводи́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">provodítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun">Noun</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Noun">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:проведение.html>проведе́ние</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">provedénije</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="neuter gender">n</abbr> | <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i>genitive</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:проведение.html>проведе́ния</a></b>, <i>nominative plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:проведение.html>проведе́ния</a></b>, <i>genitive plural</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:проведение.html>проведе́ний</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>construction, building, laying <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">of roads, cables, pipes, etc.</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li>
<li>organization, holding <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">of a meeting, event, activity</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li>
<li>carrying out, realization, implementation</li>
<li>adoption <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content">of a resolution, law</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:проводить.html>проводи́ть</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">provodítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провести.html>провести́</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">provestí</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:про.html>про</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ве<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:де.html>де</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ни.html>ни</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>е</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ние</a> | (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 7a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>про-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-вед-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ениj</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-е</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:провезти.html>провезти́</a> (25232)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology">Etymology</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B7%D1%82%D0%B8amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="Edit section: Etymology">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">про-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">pro-</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:везти.html>везти́</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">veztí</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb">Verb</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B7%D1%82%D0%B8amp;action=editamp;section=4" title="Edit section: Verb">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провезти.html>провезти́</a></strong> • (<span lang="Ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">proveztí</span>) | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> (<i>imperfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провозить.html>провози́ть</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>to transport, to convey
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:провезти.html>провезти́</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:контрабанда.html>контраба́ндой</a></i> ― <i lang="Ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>proveztí</b> kontrabándoj</i> ― <span class="e-translation">to smuggle</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms">Related terms</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B7%D1%82%D0%B8amp;action=editamp;section=6" title="Edit section: Related terms">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:провоз.html>прово́з</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">provóz</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%B7%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%8C%D1%81%D1%8Famp;action=editamp;redlink=1" class="new" title="провозиться (page does not exist)">провозиться</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">provozítʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:везти.html>везти́</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">veztí</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:повезти.html>повезти́</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">poveztí</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:возить.html>вози́ть</a></span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">vozítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">повозить</span> | <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect">pf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="Ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">povozítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"><a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B7%D1%82%D0%B8amp;action=editamp;section=2" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:морфологический.html>Морфологи́ческие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> синтаксические <a href = vnd.unilang:свойство.html>сво́йства</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:про.html>про</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:везти.html>вёз</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ти.html>ти</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:совершить.html>совершенный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. | Зализняка | — | 7b/b⑨.     <a href = vnd.unilang:вариант.html>Вариа́нт</a> прош. деепр. <i><a href = vnd.unilang:провезти.html>провёзши</a></i> <a href = vnd.unilang:являться.html>явля́ется</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:устаревший.html>устаре́вшим</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> | — | <a href = vnd.unilang:провозить.html>провози́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:приставка.html>Приста́вка</a>: <b>про-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>ко́рень</a>: <b>-вез-</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ти</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B7%D1%82%D0%B8amp;action=editamp;section=5" title="<a href = vnd.unilang:редактировать.html>Редакти́ровать</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a> «<a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a>»"><a href = vnd.unilang:править.html>пра́вить</a></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:везти.html>везя́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переместить.html>перемести́ть</a> где-либо, <a href = vnd.unilang:мимо.html>ми́мо</a> кого-, чего-либо <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  | <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. ).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
